blogPost.excerpt: 💰 Did you make bank on $GME, $AMC or anything Elon mentioned? Did you cash in at your startup's IPO? 👉 Think you can invest in this fund? You probably aren't rich enough. 🤑 This could be the fund for you.
blogPost.body: 💰 Did you make bank on $GME, $AMC or anything Elon mentioned? Did you cash in at your startup's IPO? 👉 Think you can invest in this fund? You probably aren't rich enough. 🤑 This could be the fund for you.
blogPost.title: Fuck You Money Capital - The only fund you get to spend your stonks money
blogPost.author: Toby Allen

localize.description: 💰你在$GME，$AMC或者Elon提到的任何东西上赚到钱了吗？你在你的创业公司IPO时兑现了吗？👉觉得你可以投资这个基金吗？你可能还不够有钱。🤑 这可能是适合你的基金。
localize.tagline: 唯一的基金，你可以花你的石头钱。

localize.description: 💰你在$GME，$AMC或者Elon提到的任何東西上賺到錢了嗎？你在你的創業公司IPO時兌現了嗎？👉覺得你可以投資這個基金嗎？你可能還不夠有錢。🤑 這可能是適合你的基金。
